oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Letter from Herbert Solomon Garner to Letitia Hastings Garner about family genealogy
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Garner, Herbert Solomon
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: A letter by Herbert Solomon Garner to Letitia Hastings Garner about family geneology and locating their grandfathers grave. Also mentions updates on the grandchildren.
